name: EssayTask
tag_list: essay-examples, term-paper-samples, sample-papers, free-essays, free-term-papers, essays, research-papers, custom-essay, book-reports, dissertations, examples-of-essays, sample-essays, samples-of-essays, thesis
overview:
EssayTask.com is a resource for students who are looking to enhance their essays with quality research material and fresh ideas. EssayTask provides outstanding essay examples and term paper samples on virtually any academic topic.

The database includes over 450,000 student papers and keeps growing daily.

Membership benefits include:

  • Unlimited access to all papers
  • Full essay details (page level, size, grade, etc.)
  • Cancel any time (you can stop the service with one click)
  • Outstanding support (fast, efficient and friendly customer care).
